segments.text: What kind of films do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like feature films best . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't like feature films . I think sometimes it loses contact with reality . I like to see some documentary films . What kind of feature films do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I always like to see the oldies , like The Sound of Music , Gone with the Wind . They are realty the best - in the acting , the scene and the plot .
segments.speaker: S2
